issue.title: [CF 1070] Unit Condition Icon
issue.body:
Make a Unit Condition Icon icon type to go alone with the Condition Icon icon type. I had this idea a long time ago as a shower thought, but I must have forgotten it because this feature still doesn't exist.

I also made this ticket a few days ago, but apparently it never actually posted, because the ticket also never existed. Perhaps this feature is cursed?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #1070 | Raw
